sect1.title: Zend_Filter_Inflector
sect1.para: Zend_Filter_Inflector is a general purpose tool for rules-based inflection of strings to a given target.

As an example, you may find you need to transform CamelCasedWords into a path; for readability, OS policies, or other reasons, you also need to lower case this, and you want to separate the words using a dash ('-'). An inflector can do this for you.
